name: zoneminder
description: ZoneMinder is a self-hosted video surveillance system. It captures, monitors, and analyzes video from cameras, supports motion detection and alerting, and exposes a web UI for configuration and viewing.
features: Camera support: Connect IP cameras, USB webcams, and analog cameras through capture cards with broad protocol support.
Motion detection: Automatically detect movement in camera feeds and trigger recording or alerts based on sensitivity settings.
Continuous recording: Record video continuously or only during motion events to balance storage usage and coverage.
Event management: Review, filter, and export recorded events with timestamps, thumbnails, and motion scores.
Live monitoring: View multiple camera feeds simultaneously in a grid layout with real-time streaming.
Zone configuration: Define specific areas within camera views to monitor while ignoring irrelevant motion.
Alert notifications: Send email or webhook alerts when motion is detected or cameras go offline.
PTZ control: Control pan, tilt, and zoom functions on supported cameras directly from the web interface.
Storage management: Configure retention policies to automatically delete old recordings and manage disk space.
Multi-server support: Distribute camera load across multiple servers and manage them from a central interface.
Mobile access: View live feeds and recorded events from mobile devices using responsive web interface or apps.
API integration: Automate camera control and event retrieval using REST API for home automation systems.
